skills.name: Quantum Simulation Experience
keywords: Extensive experience in modeling electronic structure and spin-dependent transport in semiconductors and device structures. Skilled in C++ and Python programming for scientific calculations and visualization including for density-matrix evolutions and electric-field-induced spin dynamics. Also acquired extensive experience during my PhD studies in ab initio calculations with commercial codes and managing C++/MPI research codes.
Experience with multiple theoretical formalisms: density functional theory, tight-binding, stochastic master equations and multiple-scattering Green’s functions

Developed Lindblad density-matrix solvers on top of QuTiP for simulating the dynamics of open quantum systems. Incorporated Monte Carlo device simulation and calculations of spin dephasing and decoherence of NV-center sensors varying environmental conditions
